sentence.Network_en: I always start a novel from a state of tabula rasa.
sentence.Network_cn: 好像是说,我总是从一种头脑放空的状态开始写作一部小说.

sentence.Network_en: They wanted to start again with nothing but their reason and a tabula rasa clean slate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们试图仅仅依凭自身的理智和清白的过去从头再来.
